data.title: Multicultural service providers
data.meta_description: Find contacts for multicultural service providers in the Northern Territory.
data.text:
Adult Migrant English Program

Phone: 1300 585 868

amep@stepsgroup.com.au

www.stepsamep.com.au

Facebook: www.facebook.com/STEPSEducationandTraining

Anglicare NT

Anglicare NT provides settlement support, services and referrals to clients (up to 5 years from arrival) under the Refugee and Migrant Settlement Services.

Phone: 08 8985 0000

www.anglicare-nt.org.au

Department of Home Affairs

Phone: 131 881 (immigration queries)

131 880 (citizenship queries)

Fax: 08 8941 2297

immi.homeaffairs.gov.au

Department of Social Services

Phone: 08 8928 6200

www.dss.gov.au

Interpreting and Translating Service NT

Interpreter and Translating Services NT provides interpreting and translating services for migrants and assists government and non-government agencies to communicate with Territorians who speak languages other than English.

Phone: 08 8999 8506

Free call for the Northern Territory: 1800 676 254

itsnt@nt.gov.au

www.itsnt.nt.gov.au

Melaleuca Australia

Melaleuca Australia provides settlement programs for humanitarian entrants, including case management and counselling.

Phone: 08 8985 3311

Fax: 08 8985 3322

admin@melaleuca.org.au

www.melaleuca.org.au

Multicultural Community Services of Central Australia

Multicultural Community Services of Central Australia Inc assists with the settlement of migrants in Alice Springs.

Phone: 08 8952 8776

Fax: 08 8952 5176

info@mcsca.org.au

www.mcsca.org.au

Facebook: www.facebook.com/mcsca.org.au

Multicultural Council of the NT

The Multicultural Council of the NT provides direct services for individuals, families and communities from culturally and linguistically diverse backgrounds in Darwin and surrounds.

Phone: 08 8945 9122

Fax: 08 8945 9155

admin@mcnt.org.au

www.mcnt.org.au

Facebook: www.facebook.com/multiculturalcouncilnt

Multilingual Broadcasting Council of the NT

Mobile: 0414 682 206

broadcastnt@outlook.com

Translating and Interpreting Service

Phone: 131 450 (24hr service 7 days a week)

tis.freeinterpreting@homeaffairs.gov.au

www.tisnational.gov.au/

The Northern Territory election will be held on Saturday, 24 August 2024. The Northern Territory Government will assume a caretaker role from Thursday, 1 August 2024. During the caretaker period, content added to this website will be in accordance with caretaker conventions. Authorised by Ken Davies on behalf of the Northern Territory Government, Department of the Chief Minister and Cabinet, Mitchell Street, Darwin.
